The Oslo node of ELIXIR Norway is coordinated by the Centre for Bioinformatics at the University of Oslo and is part of ELIXIR Norway and ELIXIR. ELIXIR Norway is largely funded by the Research Council of Norway and the partnering universities. All content on this site is available under CC0-1.0, unless otherwise specified.
